attributes.review: Seriously I have never downloaded an app as terrible as this, and I should know. I am a millennial and I would give up my avocado 🥑 toast to never see this app again. I don’t know what they were thinking...
attributes.title: I would rather not 🤢

attributes.review: But will you actually do anything this time? All you want is for the first class to do well you don’t ever care about us low class people. We need change and you are not delivering.

I download this app to see what his plans were for the next election in this app is absolute disgusting I will never vote for this ugly orange he’s a piece of crap this app is horrible and should be out of the App Store immediately like wow this is horrible  ✨Trump 2020 in a grave✨🍊🍊
attributes.title: Horrible experience

attributes.review: I opened the app and was IMMEDIATELY attack by the most horrific looking creature I have ever laid my eyes on! It was orange and wrinkled and honestly putrid. It nearly made my pet alligator turn over in his grave while he was playing on my phone! I would give this app 0 stars if I could!!😡
attributes.title: Uh oh

attributes.review: This app is completely disgusting and I definitely do not recommend downloading. It took months for me to be able to download it only to find that a cheeto was on the start up page of the app. No thank you✨🧚🏽‍♀️r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳in🧶my🧚🏻crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: DISGUSTING✨🧚🏽‍♀️😖

attributes.review: I really wanted this app until I heard that the president paid someone to take his SAT test and I read he wants to defund schools if they don’t open during a pandemic. I can not contribute to this type of behavior. And it glitches too much
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: After downloading this app and opening it. It’s hacked my bank account, deleted all my Instagram posts and lost all my photos on my device. This app is a scam and needs to be taken down. Completely unacceptable and unprofessional. APPLE DO BETTER
attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and as soon as i did donald trump showed up at my house with overdone casserole and very undercooked eggs. then proceed to throw the casserole at my 103 year old grandmother and threw the eggs at my pet rat. unfortunately he sat on my newborn. definitely do NOT recommend this app.
attributes.title: disappointed

attributes.review: Got the app to see what the hype was about. It was working fine for a little while but then started to crash and glitch. Figured it was just my phone so I restarted my phone but it continued.
attributes.title: Waste of time

attributes.review: This app created a virus on my old phone that deleted every single thing but this app. I would have thought it was something else if it didn’t just leave that app by itself.
attributes.title: App created a Virus
